name: Private Tutor to the Duke's Daughter
description: Allen failed his court sorcerer exam. The world is harsh. He doesn't even have the money to return to his family home. While searching for work, Allen is offered a job as the private tutor for a duke's daughter. It sounds suspicious, but surely she can't be more trouble than that "albatross". Just as he lets his guard down, he finds himself face-to-face with a girl completely unable to use magic?! What exactly is blocking her ability to use magic? Allen's unconventional lesson that defies common sense gently illuminates the girl's future.

name: Hero Without a Class: Who Even Needs Skills?
The Fated Magical Princess: Who Made Me a Princess
Our Dating Story: The Experienced You and The Inexperienced Me
description:
Ryuto Kashima is a gloomy, boring boy who, of course, never had a girlfriend for 16 years. Meanwhile, his heroine, Luna Shirakawa, is the most beautiful gal in his grade with plenty of romantic experience.

He thought it was enough for him just to admire her from afar, but to his surprise, they ended up going out together!

Thus began the love story about a boy with practically zero romantic experience and a gal with tons of it!

name: Chillin' in Another World with Level 2 Super Cheat Powers
description:
Banaza lives his life working as an ordinary merchant. One day, he gets summoned to the Magical Kingdom of Klyrode as a Hero Candidate. However, because his Level 1 abilities are the same as those of an average citizen, he is branded a failed hero and is unable to return home because of a mistake made by the kingdom.

Banaza is banished from the royal capital to the frontier. While trying to survive in the forest, he fights off slimes that attack him. Upon reaching Level 2, all his stats become the unfamiliar "∞" symbol.

This is the story of a man blessed with Transcendence who chose to change his name and appearance to live his life in a different world, a demon who fell in love with a member of the enemy race, and their tumultuous married life. They strive for a peaceful life as they rope in characters of all different races!

name: I've Been Killing Slimes for 300 Years and Maxed Out My Level
In/Spectre
description: Serving as the Goddess of Wisdom of the spectres, Kotoko Iwanaga has solved countless troubles  coming from their unique circumstances. However, the person she fell in love with; Kuro Sakuragawana, turned out to be a man feared even by the spectres?! This is the story of Romance x Mystical x Mystery revolving around this extraordinary couple, facing countless mysterious cases caused by the spectres. Watch their relationship develop as the two face many bizarre incidents coming their way!

name: The Dawn of the Witch
description:
Saybil is a student of the academy of magic, however, he has no memories of his life before entering the academy. 
His daily life at the academy is full of emptiness as he himself couldn't figure out why he was here in the first place. 
Without any motivation, his grade is always among the lowest. 
One day, the principal, Albus, suddenly sent Saybil to a dangerous special training.
"I want you to spread words of the usefulness of magic in a land where witch hunts exist."
It has been years after the end of the war between the witches and the church, 
but society hasn't fully accepted both witches and magic.
It is the dawn of the witch.
This is a self-discovery story of an ordinary boy and his friends with a hidden past.

name: Beheneko: The Elf-Girl's Cat is Secretly an S-Ranked Monster!
description: Ruine, the city of Labyrinthos, where monsters run rampant within a maze-like dungeon, is home to countless adventurers.The protagonist, who lost his life and was reincarnated, wakes up inside the dungeon. And instead of a human, he looks just like a kitten!? But his true identity is that of an S-rank disaster-class monster... He's turned into a baby Behemoth!He encounters Aria, a novice D-rank adventurer. Mistaking him for a kitten, Aria takes the severely injured protagonist back with her to treat his wounds. She names him "Tama" and keeps him as her pet. Touched by her kindness, Tama vows to become Aria's knight and protector.Utilizing his S-rank abilities, Tama explores the dungeon alongside Aria. He'll meet a variety of unique companions, and sometimes be the subject of way too much cuddling, as his days as a knight (pet) begin!

name: Chained Soldier
description:
Mysterious gates suddenly appear all over Japan.
In another dimension beyond the gate called Mato, there are Peaches that only women can eat giving them unique abilities. They are fighting as a female-organized fighting group, the "Demon Defense Force", in order to exterminate the monster known as "Shuuki".

One day, Yuuki Wakura, a high school boy who is looking for a place to play a role, happens to wander into Mato and is attacked by Shuukis. Kyouka Uzen, the beautiful commander of the Demon Defense Force 7th Squad, rushes to his aid. Yuuki is transformed into a slave by Kyouka's ability, and then he successfully defeats Shuukis. He ends up fighting Shuukis as a slave and the caretaker of the Demon Defense Force.

A battle fantasy of "the boy who becomes a pet" starts here!

name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
description:
▶️ 《That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime》 
🔥 Full Series Playlist： 
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwLSw1_eDZl3_YNRvXA7O89pNPsj1WIkb

name: 7th Time Loop: The Villainess Enjoys a Carefree Life Married to Her Worst Enemy!
description:
The duke's daughter, Rishe Irmgard Weitzner, has a secret.
That is, "if she lost her life at the age of 20, she would return to the moment of the annulment of her engagement five years ago."
She has enjoyed various lifestyles to her heart's content, such as being a merchant, an apothecary, a maid, and a knight.
But this is her 7th time, and she decides to live a long and happy life.

name: Momokuri
description:
"I want to know everything about the person I love!" Yuki Kurihara, a second year high school student, falls in love with Shinya Momotsuki, who is a year younger than her. After she takes a hundred hidden camera pictures of him from a distance for her "Momo-kun Photo Collection", she decides to tell him she likes him. The two of them start to date, but Kurihara still continues to take hidden camera photos and collect the things he touches, and she's acting kind of weird. A romantic comedy about the love between two people who don't know how to express their feelings!
Is my love... weird?

name: NEW GAME!
description: After graduating from high school, Suzukaze Aoba is accepted to a job at "Eagle Jump", the game company that developed "Fairies Story", a game she was obsessed with. On her first day as a new employee, Aoba arrives at work at "Eagle Jump" on a crowded morning train. She hesitates when she is already in the front of the building, wondering whether she should just walk in, unable to take the first step. Then, Toyama Rin approached, one of her senior employees who has just arrived at work, and Aoba is safely guided inside "Eagle Jump".

name: Spy × Family
description:
In an era in which the nations of the world were waging a fierce war of information, Ostania and Westalis had been in a cold war state for decades. 
Twilight is one of the best spies from Westalis and he has been charged with the top-secret mission to keep his eye on Desmond, a key figure from Ostania who is threatening the peace between the East and the West.

His mission is to "Establish a family and infiltrate the social circle at the prestigious school his target's son attends.

However, the daughter Twilight meets is a telepath who can read people's minds and his wife is an assassin! The peace of the world rests in the hands of a family of three hiding their true identities from each other.

name: DAN DA DAN
description: When high schooler Momo, from a family of spirit mediums, first meets her classmate Okarun, an occult geek, they argue – Momo believes in ghosts but denies aliens, and Okarun believes in aliens but denies ghosts. When it turns out both phenomena are real, Momo awakens a hidden power and Okarun gains the power of a curse; together, they must challenge the paranormal forces threatening their world.

name: Shikimori's Not Just a Cutie
description:
The best and coolest girlfriend is here! Izumi-kun, a high school boy who’s born with bad luck, has a girlfriend, Shikimori-san, who is his classmate. She has a beautiful smile, is kind, and always seems happy when she is with Izumi-kun. She's pretty, cute, and full of love, but when Izumi is in trouble… She turns into the coolest girlfriend ever!
The fun daily life of the cute and cool Shikimori-san, Izumi-kun and their good friends never stops!
The love comedy with 1000% preciousness is finally getting started!

name: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End
description:
After ten long years of adventuring, the mage Frieren alongside the hero Himmel and his party members has defeated the Demon Lord and brought peace to the world.

As an elf that can live for more than a thousand years, Frieren went to travel alone, with a promise that she would reunite with Himmel and the others later on.

50 years later, Frieren visited Himmel. However, in contrast to her being no different from how she was 50 years ago, Himmel has aged a lot and doesn’t have long to live.

A short time later, after seeing Himmel passes away before her own eyes, she finally realizes that she has never made any effort to “understand people.”

With that regret, Frieren heads on a journey to “understand people.”
On her journey, she will meet with all kinds of people and deal with all kinds of things.

name: Apocalypse Bringer Mynoghra: World Conquest Starts with the Civilization of Ruin
The Shy Hero and the Assassin Princesses
